TopicTitle: I may be looked at oddly, but...

Articles.Content:
I don't really know who WackJob is. I think I saw a few posts from him on warp drive, but that's it.

Would like it if someone gave me a quick biography of him. Not a real life one, just kerbal gameplay.

Just have a look through this thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36572-I-am-full-of-grief-and-coffee?highlight=Grief+coffee

He is mainly known for building the impossible.

I'd highly advise you to get in touch with the man himself. You can send him a Private Message through this link to his profile

Locking this, because having public threads discussing individual forum members is a really bad idea.
